pinyin: zuò wéi yī míng dà xuéshēng, ruò yào qǔdé yōuxiù de xuéyè hé jiào gāo de xiào nèi píngjià, bìxū xuéhuì wén guò zé xǐ, jíshí gǎizhèng bùzú zhī chù.

en: Fill out your liaison book well, so that parents know about your learning progress.
pinyin: Hǎohǎo tiánxiě liánluòbù, ràng jiāzhǎng zhīdào nǐ de xuéxí jìnzhǎn.

en: Don't forget to bring your liaison book home on weekends for your parents to sign.
pinyin: Zhōumò bié wàngle dài liánluòbù huíjiā ràng jiāzhǎng qiānmíng.

en: If your liaison book is lost, go find the teacher now to get a replacement.
pinyin: Rúguǒ nǐ de liánluòbù diūle, xiànzài jiù qù zhǎo lǎoshī bǔfā yīfèn.

en: The interviewee's answer surprised the reporter.
pinyin: Bèi fǎngzhě de huídá ràng jìzhě gǎndào jīngqí.

en: The interviewee needs to do some preparation before the interview.
pinyin: Bèi fǎngzhě zài jiēshòu cǎifǎng qián xūyào zuò yīxiē zhǔnbèi.

en: The interviewee's attitude has an important impact on the entire interview.
pinyin: Bèi fǎngzhě de tàidù duì zhěnggè cǎifǎng yǒu zhuóyào yǐngxiǎng.

en: Whenever I hear laughter, my mood becomes very cheerful.
pinyin: měi dāng wǒ tīng dào ēi xiào shēng, xīn qíng jiù huì biàn dé hěn yú kuài.

en: At this party, we all laughed happily.
pinyin: zài zhè ge jù huì shàng, wǒ men dōu kāi xīn de ēi xiào zhe.

en: Tell a joke, I want to hear everyone's laughter.
pinyin: jiǎng gè xiào huà ba, wǒ xiǎng tīng tīng dà jiā de ēi xiào shēng.

en: This village is so poor that there is not even a stand to prop up a awl, with almost no means of production.
pinyin: zhè gè cūn zhuàng pín wú lì zhuī, jǐ hū méi yǒu rèn hé shēng chǎn zī liào.

en: Her cooking skills are so poor that even the dog won't eat the food she makes.
pinyin: tā de liào lǐ shuǐ píng wú lì zhuī, zuò chū lái de fàn cài lián gǒu dōu bù chī.

en: His attitude towards study is so poor that he plays games every day without reading any books.
pinyin: tā de xué xí tài du pín wú lì zhuī, tiān tiān wán yóu xì bù dú shū.

en: I really like the cultural atmosphere in L'viv.
pinyin: Wǒ hěn xǐ huān lǐ wéi yē lā de wén huà fēn wéi.

en: Lviv is one of the most beautiful cities in Ukraine.
pinyin: Lǐ wéi yē lā shì wū kè lán zuì měi lì de chéng shì zhī yī.

en: In Lviv, you can taste one of the best coffees in the world.
pinyin: Zài lǐ wéi yē lā, nǐ kě yǐ pǐn cháng dào shì jiè shàng zuì hǎo de kā fēi zhī yī.

en: The late autumn breeze blows away the leaves outside the window.
pinyin: lán fēng chuī sàn le chuāng wài de shù yè

en: The light breeze brushes across the lake.
pinyin: lán fēng fú guò hú miàn

en: The fragrance of roasted duck wafts in on the breeze.
pinyin: lán fēng zhōng piāo lái le kǎo yā de xiāng wèi

en: His father is a retired army lieutenant.
pinyin: Tā de fùqīn shì yī míng tuìwǔ lùjūn zhōngwèi.

en: In military school, he successfully promoted to army lieutenant.
pinyin: Zài jūnxiào lǐ, tā chénggōng de jìnshēng wèi lùjūn zhōngwèi.

en: The new commander of this unit is an experienced army lieutenant.
pinyin: Zhège dānwèi de xīn zhǐhuīguān shì yī míng yǒu jīngyàn de lùjūn zhōngwèi.

en: The hero died an unfortunate death, but his efforts in pacifying the frontier were immeasurable.
pinyin: Hǎo hàn sǐ yú fēimìng, jìngbiān gōngdé wúliàng.

en: The heroic deeds in pacifying the frontier are still sung in the ancient battlefields of past dynasties.
pinyin: Lìdài de gǔ zhànchǎng, jìngbiān de shìjì yījiù chuán sòng.

en: In order to protect the safety of the country, the mission of pacifying the frontier is extremely arduous.
pinyin: Wèile guójiā de ān wēi, jìngbiān rènwù shífēn jiān jù.

en: A beautiful headband can increase your charm.
pinyin: hǎo kàn de tóu shéng néng gòu zēng jiā nǐ de mèi lì.

en: The color of this headband is perfect for summer.
pinyin: zhè ge tóu shéng de yán sè hěn shì hé xià tiān.

en: My younger sister wears a headband every day.
pinyin: wǒ mèi mei měi tiān dōu dài zhe tóu shéng.

en: It seems that not many people have been convicted of the crime of overthrowing the government.
pinyin: hǎoxiàng méiyǒu duōshǎo rén bèi kòng yǐ diānfù zhèngfǔ zuì chénglì.,

en: Overthrowing the government is a special criminal charge in the criminal law of many countries.
pinyin: diānfù zhèngfǔ zuì shì gèguó xíngfǎ zhōng de yīgè tèshū zuìmíng.,

en: Overthrowing the government is a serious crime that may lead to severe penalties.
pinyin: diānfù zhèngfǔ zuì shì yīgè yánzhòng de zuìxíng, kěnéng huì dǎozhì jíqí yánlì de xíngfá.,

en: I like to eat molapi in the summer.
pinyin: Mòlāpí

en: This dish adds molapi as a flavoring to improve the taste.
pinyin: Zhè dào cài jiārùle mòlāpí zuòwéi kǒugǎn shàng de tiáowèi

en: The chef sprinkled some crushed peanuts on the molapi.
pinyin: Chúshī zài mòlāpí shàng sǎ shàngle yīxiē huāshēng suì

en: He has buck teeth.
pinyin: tā yǒu yī kǒu jǔ chǐ

en: She ate too many candies, causing dental misalignment problems.
pinyin: tā chī le tài duō táng guǒ,zào chéng le jú yǔ de wèn tí
